data.text: @BlooreJon @pvfcprogs Defo on for promotion that year, very unlucky with what happened
@ChrisMcCarthy11 @pvfcprogs I remember this game well, Vale should have had 2 stonewall penalties and it would have been us in the play offs. With the momentum we had at the time who knows?
@MountfordCm Your probably right, Chris. Still time to turn it around this season but weâ€™re definitely making hard work of it.
@pvfcprogs Only 2 years ago, just 6 members of this squad left!! Probably another big turnover of players in the summer too
@pvfcprogs Not sure we are any better now?
@pvfcprogs Sliding doors moment with the penalty given, then ruled out by the linesman. If that was given #PVFC would have been in the playoffs.
